data.title: Reasonable Faith
data.meta_description: Reasonable Faith provides a Christian perspective on the most important issues. Find a deep library of resources featuring the work of Dr. William Lane Craig.
data.text:
Forum Neuroscience

A board for posting links to current, peer-reviewed research in the field of Neuroscience. This is not a discussion board, but is a kind of compendium of research in the field which will be helpful to interested RF members who wish stay abreast of what is a quickly-developing research programme.

Forum Promotional Material

We often get people coming to the forum and their initial post contains some kind of personal promotional material, such as a link to a blog they wrote or a Youtube channel that they run. While maintaining that this is a forum for substantive philosophical discussion and not one for posting personal promotional material, it would be a shame to turn away those who are genuinely interested in discussion and are simply naive to the fact that what their doing is bad-mannered. This is a board for sharing your website, Youtube channel, blog, etc.
